text: Major General Vicente Mondéjar Piccio (1 March 1927 – 28 April 2015) was a Filipino soldier. He was Chief of the Philippine Air Force during the last years of the dictatorship of Ferdinand Marcos, notably during the 1986 People Power Revolution. ==Other websites== *Biography from the Philippine Air Force website Category:1927 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Filipino generals Category:People from Iloilo
title: Vicente Mondéjar Piccio
